mapper.select: select customer_code as customerCode ,customer_name as customerName ,customer_phone as customerPhone ,customer_corporate_registration_number as customerCorporateRegistrationNumber ,customer_address as customerAddress ,customer_bank as customerBank ,customer_account_holder as customerAccountHolder ,customer_account_number as customerAccountNumber ,customer_use as customerUse ,customer_date as customerDate ,member_id as memberId from customer
